features: Active Magnetic Vehicles Playset – This 72-piece set includes a large play mat, 16 road signs, and 55 STEM parts to create endless colorful models. Our construction toys are put together using magnets which makes them more fun for young toddlers and preschool-aged children

Early Learning and STEM Challenges – The science and technology behind our magnetic construction toys inspires critical thinking, builds hand-eye coordination, promotes pattern recognition, increase visual perception skills, and much more

Endless Colorful Exciting Hands-On Designs – The MOBIUS Toys kid’s construction toys play set with step-by-step instructions lets kids snap-together 19 different toy construction trucks which gives them tons of different options for building and playing for hours of engaging, hands-on fun

Create a Large Play Area – The addition of the 31.5" x 27.5" play mat not only provides a safe, comfortable place to play kids can set up their own little construction zone with road signs, keep pieces together more easily, and “drive” the trucks all around

Zero-Risk Service and Support – Here at MOBIUS Toys we’re committed to providing fast, reliable customer service and satisfaction which is why every order comes with responsive support and quality control you can trust

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Build, Design, and Snap Together Endless Unique Magnetic Construction Toys There are few things young children love more than building something with their own hands, especially when they get to use magnets! We created this super fun and interactive magnetic vehicle playset for kids who love building, creating, and designing things that move. A 72-piece magnetic building set lets kids create 9 different vehicles and comes with all the accessories they’ll need to create a construction zone that’s ready for hands-on action.

Snap-Together Magnets Far easier for small hands than thick Lego-style bricks these magnetic pieces snap together easily but hold firm, so kids can create something that’s fun and unique without worrying about pushing or pulling too hard to get it finished. Perfect for preschoolers. Exciting Construction Vehicles Kids can make 19 different vehicles with each 72-piece set including things like an excavator, forklift, and bulldozer. In fact, they can come up with all kinds of their own unique ideas and really expand their creativity and imagination every time they play. Bright and Detailed Play Mat The 31.5" x 27.5" play area is designed with warm, vibrant colors and fun images that really enhance the overall building and play experience. Kids can use the additional signs to build construction zones, set up a little town, and create a world that’s all their own. Kid-Friendly Magnetics We use premium-grade magnets in our kid’s building toys which makes them easier and safer for young children. In fact, the pieces stick together more readily which makes building or taking things apart more kid-friendly, so they can focus on the good times.

Expand Imaginations with Creative Building and Active Play Expand Imaginations with Creative Building and Active Play It’s more important than ever that we give our children healthy ways to get away from the TV, tablet, and phones and enjoy hands-on play again. That’s why our magnetic construction playset is the perfect choice for young children and comes with everything they’ll need to be creative, including: 55 STEM Parts16 Road Signs1 Large 31.5" x 27.5" Play MatInstructional Manual for 19 Different Model Builds When it comes to your child’s imagination MOBIUS Toys is committed to helping them learn and grow through hands-on learning opportunities that leave them feeling more confident on the road ahead. And every order includes our reliable customer support and responsive service, so you can trust you’re getting the support that can’t be beaten.

UNLEASH FUN & CREATIVITY MOBIUS Toys are designed to inspire children while helping them express their unique imaginations. We want them to learn, explore, and open up a new world of possibilities BUILD FINE MOTOR SKILLS Our interactive toys are all about getting kids moving and playing which can help improve cognitive recognition, fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and confidence INSPIRE ACTIVE LEARNING These kid’s toys are a great way to help them better understand spatial awareness, critical thinking, and vehicle/object application which strengthens STEM learning ENCOURAGE SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT MOBIUS Toys are not only great for playing solo they’re a wonderful way to spend quality time with friends, siblings, or parents. Important for building social skills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good concept but tricky in reality
reviews.reviewText: I like the concept of creating different kinds of construction vehicles with magnetic materials. The magnet system works well to connect the materials together. However, for quality, it is easy to make scratches on the plastic when you take sections off. Also, they are quite tricky to put together for young children. Even for me, it’s not that easy. The product recommended age is 3+, but 3-year-old and 4-year-old do not have the muscle strength to put the construction vehicles together. We had friends with 3-5 years old children to come for play date, and we had to assemble the vehicles for children. The children enjoyed playing with them. Just need adults help put together or take apart all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Magnetic not steong
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed gave to 3 year old, they are sturdy come in nice container However the magnets are weak and when you try to connect one car to another they do not hold. The top wheel guards seem to extend out slightly preventing the magnets to fully take hold, or magnets are just weak
